emails.subject: Team Outing Planning
emails.body:
Good morning team,

We’re planning a team outing next month and would like your input on activities. Options include a cooking class, an escape room, or a half-day hike. Please reply with your preference by end of this week.

Cheers,
Eventify Events Team

emails.subject: Re: Team Outing Planning
emails.body:
Hi,

I vote for the escape room — looks fun and will test our teamwork. Thanks for organizing!

Best,
The Team
